Package dms.gui

package dms.gui
Swing-based user interface for the Movie Manager DMS. Contains frames, dialogs, table views and user-facing actions (CRUD, search, metrics). GUI components delegate validation and persistence to the service layer.
Since:
1.0
Author:
Luis Augusto Monserratt
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    MovieFormDialog
    Modal dialog window used for creating or editing a Movie record.
    MovieTableFrameMysql
    Main Swing window for the MySQL-backed Movie Manager DMS.
